verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> of Samuel לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> came to all Israel וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out יִשְׂרָאֵל֩ <WH3478> Now Israel לִקְרַ֨את <WH7122> to meet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> the Philistines לַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> to battle וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched עַל־ <WH5921> beside הָאֶ֣בֶן הָעֵ֔זֶר <WH72> beside Ebenezer וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> and the Philistines חָנ֥וּ <WH2583> pitched בַאֲפֵֽק׃ <WH663> in Aphek

וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <WH6186> put themselves in array פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> And the Philistines לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel וַתִּטֹּשׁ֙ <WH5203> and when they joined הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> battle וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <WH5062> was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּכּ֤וּ <WH5221> and they slew בַמַּֽעֲרָכָה֙ <WH4634> of the army בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> in the field כְּאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> about four אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> were come הָעָם֮ <WH5971> And when the people אֶל־ <WH413> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֒ <WH4264> into the camp וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why נְגָפָ֧נוּ <WH5062> smitten יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Wherefore hath the LORD הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> us to day לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> Philistine נִקְחָ֧ה <WH3947> accept אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <WH413> to מִשִּׁלֹ֗ה <WH7887> out of Shiloh אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיָבֹ֣א <WH935> unto us that when it cometh בְקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <WH7130> among וְיֹשִׁעֵ֖נוּ <WH3467> us it may save מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> of our enemies

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent הָעָם֙ <WH5971> So the people שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> to Shiloh וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> that they might bring מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> from thence the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> which dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims וְשָׁ֞ם <WH8033> there שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> of Eli עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> [were] there with the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God חָפְנִ֖י <WH2652> Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <WH6372> and Phinehas

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּב֨וֹא <WH935> came אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> And when the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> into the camp וַיָּרִ֥עוּ <WH7321> shouted כָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> all Israel תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> shout גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> with a great וַתֵּהֹ֖ם <WH1949> rang again הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> so that the earth

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> heard פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> And when the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֔ה <WH8643> of the shout וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> they said מֶ֠ה <WH4100> What ק֣וֹל <WH6963> What [meaneth] the noise הַתְּרוּעָ֧ה <WH8643> shout הַגְּדוֹלָ֛ה <WH1419> of this great הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> in בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> in the camp הָעִבְרִ֑ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> understood כִּ֚י <WH3588> that אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> that the ark יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֖א <WH935> was come אֶל־ <WH413> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> into the camp

וַיִּֽרְאוּ֙ <WH3372> were afraid הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> And the Philistines כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמְר֔וּ <WH559> for they said בָּ֥א <WH935> is come אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶל־ <WH413> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> into the camp וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they said א֣וֹי <WH188> Woe לָ֔נוּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> For לֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing הָיְתָ֛ה <WH1961> has happened כָּזֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise אֶתְמ֥וֹל <WH865> before time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <WH8032> before that time

א֣וֹי <WH188> Woe לָ֔נוּ מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַצִּילֵ֔נוּ <WH5337> unto us who shall deliver מִיַּ֛ד <WH3027> us out of the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> are the gods הָאַדִּירִ֖ים <WH117> of these mighty הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these אֵ֧לֶּה <WH428> of these הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> are the gods הַמַּכִּ֧ים <WH5221> that smote אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַכָּ֖ה <WH4347> with all the plagues בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

הִֽתְחַזְּק֞וּ <WH2388> Be strong וִֽהְי֤וּ <WH1961> and quit לַֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> and be men פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> O ye Philistines פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> or תַּעַבְד֣וּ <WH5647> that ye be not servants לָעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> unto the Hebrews כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> as they have been לָכֶ֑ם וִהְיִיתֶ֥ם <WH1961> to you quit לַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> therefore be men וְנִלְחַמְתֶּֽם׃ <WH3898> and fight

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> fought פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> And the Philistines וַיִּנָּ֤גֶף <WH5062> was smitten יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and Israel וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <WH5127> and they fled אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְאֹהָלָ֔יו <WH168> into his tent וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַמַּכָּ֖ה <WH4347> slaughter גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and there was a very וַיִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> for there fell מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand רַגְלִֽי׃ <WH7273> footmen

וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> And the ark אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God נִלְקָ֑ח <WH3947> was taken וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> and the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons עֵלִי֙ <WH5941> of Eli מֵ֔תוּ <WH4191> were slain חָפְנִ֖י <WH2652> Hophni וּפִֽינְחָֽס׃ <WH6372> and Phinehas

וַיָּ֤רָץ <WH7323> And there ran אִישׁ־ <WH376> a man בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> of Benjamin מֵהַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <WH4634> out of the army וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> and came שִׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> to Shiloh בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> the same וּמַדָּ֣יו <WH4055> with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <WH7167> rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> and with earth עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> upon his head

וַיָּב֗וֹא <WH935> And when he came וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold עֵ֠לִי <WH5941> lo Eli יֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> sat עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַכִּסֵּ֜א <WH3678> upon a seat [יַךְ כ] (יַ֥ד <WH5221> beat ק) דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> the road מְצַפֶּ֔ה <WH6822> watching כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become לִבּוֹ֙ <WH3820> for his heart חָרֵ֔ד <WH2730> trembled עַ֖ל <WH5921> for אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> for the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And when the man בָּ֚א <WH935> came לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> and told בָּעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וַתִּזְעַ֖ק <WH2199> cried out כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> [it] all the city

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard עֵלִי֙ <WH5941> And when Eli אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the noise הַצְּעָקָ֔ה <WH6818> of the crying וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> he said מֶ֛ה <WH4100> What ק֥וֹל <WH6963> What [meaneth] the noise הֶהָמ֖וֹן <WH1995> commotion הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man מִהַ֔ר <WH4116> in hastily וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> came וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> and told לְעֵלִֽי׃ <WH5941> Eli

וְעֵלִ֕י <WH5941> Now Eli בֶּן־ <WH1121> old תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> was ninety וּשְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> and eight שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וְעֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> and his eyes קָ֔מָה <WH6965> were dim וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָכ֖וֹל <WH3201> that he could לִרְאֽוֹת׃ <WH7200> not see

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> unto Eli אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I הַבָּ֣א <WH935> I [am] he that came מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמַּעֲרָכָ֔ה <WH4634> out of the army וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמַּעֲרָכָ֖ה <WH4634> out of the army נַ֣סְתִּי <WH5127> and I fled הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> to day וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> And he said מֶֽה־ <WH4100> How הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> go הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> What is there done בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> afflicted

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered הַֽמְבַשֵּׂ֜ר <WH1319> And the messenger וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said נָ֤ס <WH5127> is fled יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> has also מַגֵּפָ֥ה <WH4046> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> and there hath been also a great הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> been בָעָ֑ם <WH5971> among the people וְגַם־ <WH1571> also שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> and thy two בָנֶ֜יךָ <WH1121> sons מֵ֗תוּ <WH4191> are dead חָפְנִי֙ <WH2652> also Hophni וּפִ֣ינְחָ֔ס <WH6372> and Phinehas וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> and the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God נִלְקָֽחָה׃ <WH3947> is taken פ

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become כְּהַזְכִּיר֣וֹ ׀ <WH2142> And it came to pass when he made mention אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> of the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God וַיִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> that he fell מֵֽעַל־ <WH5921> and הַ֠כִּסֵּא <WH3678> from off the seat אֲחֹ֨רַנִּ֜ית <WH322> backward בְּעַ֣ד ׀ <WH1157> by יַ֣ד <WH3027> the side הַשַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> of the gate וַתִּשָּׁבֵ֤ר <WH7665> brake מַפְרַקְתּוֹ֙ <WH4665> and his neck וַיָּמֹ֔ת <WH4191> and he died כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זָקֵ֥ן <WH2204> for he was an old הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man וְכָבֵ֑ד <WH3515> and heavy וְה֛וּא <WH1931> he שָׁפַ֥ט <WH8199> And he had judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְכַלָּת֣וֹ <WH3618> And his daughter in law אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife פִּינְחָס֮ <WH6372> Phinehas' הָרָ֣ה <WH2030> was with child לָלַת֒ <WH3205> [near] to be delivered וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and when she heard אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁמֻעָ֔ה <WH8052> the tidings אֶל־ <WH413> that הִלָּקַח֙ <WH3947> was taken אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וּמֵ֥ת <WH4191> were dead חָמִ֖יהָ <WH2524> and that her father in law וְאִישָׁ֑הּ <WH376> and her husband וַתִּכְרַ֣ע <WH3766> she bowed וַתֵּ֔לֶד <WH3205> herself and travailed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נֶהֶפְכ֥וּ <WH2015> came עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> for צִרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6735> for her pains

וּכְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And about the time מוּתָ֗הּ <WH4191> of her death וַתְּדַבֵּ֙רְנָה֙ <WH1696> by her said הַנִּצָּב֣וֹת <WH5324> the women that stood עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <WH3372> unto her Fear כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בֵ֣ן <WH1121> a son יָלָ֑דְתְּ <WH3205> not for thou hast born וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָנְתָ֖ה <WH6030> But she answered וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or שָׁ֥תָה <WH7896> pay לִבָּֽהּ׃ <WH3820> attention

וַתִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> And she named לַנַּ֗עַר <WH5288> the child אִֽי־ כָבוֹד֙ <WH350> Ichabod לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying גָּלָ֥ה <WH1540> is departed כָב֖וֹד <WH3519> The glory מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> from Israel אֶל־ <WH413> because הִלָּקַח֙ <WH3947> was taken אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וְאֶל־ <WH413> and because חָמִ֖יהָ <WH2524> and because of her father in law וְאִישָֽׁהּ׃ <WH376> and her husband

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said גָּלָ֥ה <WH1540> is departed כָב֖וֹד <WH3519> The glory מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> from Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִלְקַ֖ח <WH3947> is taken אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> for the ark הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God פ
